name: drunkard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who often drinks large amounts of alcohol: Her husband turned out to be a drunkard.
More examplesFewer examplesA cousin, who was a drunkard, took the picture and traded it for a case of tequila.He used to work for the US State Department but got fired for being a drunkard, as he put it.He died a drunkard's death, leaving behind a widow to care for their daughter and his aged mother. He is an orphan, living in a train station with his drunkard uncle.
